definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_joins_world</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPhantom</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">((Phantom)entity).goalSelector.addGoal(1, new AvoidEntityGoal((Passive)entity, Player.class, 10f, 1, 1.2) {@Override public boolean shouldExecute() {return super.shouldExecute() && BbbProcedure.executeProcedure(ImmutableMap.of("entity", this.avoidTarget, "world", this.avoidTarget.world));}});</field></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
